TopicTitle: Having a hard time adding panels to my space warship, was wondering if there was any ways to make it easier?

Articles.Content: So, I'm having a really hard time adding structural panels to my space warship, I wish there was an easier way to do this but I haven't found any yet and I don't know what to do or what tricks I could use to help myself. Also here's the mod folder in case you need that since its modded.
